content: उपसृप् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To approach, move towards, draw near to; ममोपांतिकमुपसर्पन् <ls>M. 1</ls>; <ls n="M.">1. 12.</ls> {@--2@} To meet unexpectedly. {@--3@} To move, go; प्रतिवातं न हि घनः कदाचिदुपसर्पति <ls>Pt. 3. 23</ls>; so प्रलयं, दुःखं &c. {@--4@} To begin (with <ab>inf.</ab>); <ls>Ms. 10. 105.</ls> {@--5@} To attack.
